wikipedia_page.main: Stephen John Jack (born 27 March 1971) is a Scottish former footballer who played for Queen's Park, Clydebank, Stirling Albion, Cowdenbeath and Dumbarton.

link_mentions.page: List of University of the Witwatersrand people

response: * The League match against Elgin City on 30 September marked Stephen Jack's 100th appearance for Dumbarton in all national competitions - the 117th Dumbarton player to reach this milestone.
